entities.name: buckbeak
entities.description: Buckbeak is a specific horse that is mentioned in the context of an appeal.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is one of the main characters, a student at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is one of the main characters, a student at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

entities.name: ministry of magic
entities.description: The Ministry of Magic is a governing body that oversees the wizarding world in the Harry Potter series.

entities.name: executioner
entities.description: An executioner is a person responsible for carrying out executions, mentioned in the context of Buckbeak's appeal.

relationships.description: The Ministry of Magic has an executioner, who is being brought to the appeal.
Harry is informed by a letter from the Ministry of Magic about the upcoming appeal and executioner's presence.
